articles.description: The South African Weather Service has predicted frosty days ahead.
articles.content:
JOHANNESBURG - More cold weather is in store for Gauteng.

articles.author: Erika Gibson
articles.title: Ramaphosa grabs SAA flight worth estimated R2.6m, as presidential plane sits - TimesLIVE
articles.description: President Cyril Ramaphosa and at least 11 passengers travelled at huge cost on an SAA A340 passenger jet to the Southern African Development Community summit in Kinshasa this week because none of the air force VIP fleet is serviceable.
